Key Match Events: Arshdeep Singh took 3 wickets and was Player of the Match.
Mayank Yadav made his debut and performed well.
Hardik Pandya finished the game with a six.
Sanju Samson was run out in a mix-up.
Bangladesh were bowled out for 127 runs.
Pre-Game Insights: Bangladesh needed to adapt to the pitch conditions and put pressure on India.
India had a strong lineup with key players like Suryakumar Yadav and Hardik Pandya.
Post-Match Reflections: Suryakumar Yadav praised the team's character and the debutants.
Najmul Hossain Shanto acknowledged Bangladesh's struggles but highlighted Rishad Hossain's performance.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Shrimant Madhavrao Scindia Cricket Stadium in Gwalior.
The series is a Bangladesh tour of India, starting with 3 T20Is.
Others: The match was streamed on JioCinema and broadcast on Sports18.
The series standings and head-to-head statistics were mentioned.
